scenario_text.value: Oh, man. This isn’t right either...

You’d think after all the time I’ve spent
here I wouldn’t get lost...

Huh? Takuma, what are you doing here? Is
something wrong?

Oh, Saki, am I glad to see you. Actually,
I kind of got lost.
You got lost? Here?! Ahahahaha!

Do you have no sense of direction? I don’t
believe it!

(You know, it really isn’t any fun getting
laughed at like this.)
(But I’m still glad I ran into Saki.)

Yeah, well, could you tell me how to get back
to the school? I could use some directions.

From me? Well, I don’t know. I’ll have to
think real hard about that one...

(I feel like she’s making fun of me. Maybe
I shouldn’t have asked.)
How should I respond?
Please! You have to!
I’ll find my own way.
Are you teasing me?
Please! You have to!

Oh, stop. Come on, there’s no need to beg.
It’s really not that big a deal.

But hey, if it means that much to you,
I guess I’ll just have to lend a hand!

You know what? Forget it. I’ll find my own
way back.
What? Hey, Takuma!

(I really didn’t appreciate Saki treating me
like that just now.)

(If that’s how she’s going to be about it,
I’d rather not feel like I owe her.)

Wait, stop! I’m sorry. I didn’t mean to make
you upset.

Seriously, it’s dangerous if you go that way.
You’ll never make it back.

We need to go this way, come on. I promise
I won’t say another word about it, okay?

(I just don’t know what to make of Saki. It’s
like suddenly she’s a different person.)
Saki, are you teasing me?
What? Is...is that what you thought?

Yeah, pretty much. It felt like you were
making fun of me.

Oh no... I guess I messed up again. Look,
sometimes I slip up when I say things.

People would always misunderstand me back in
our world, too. I need to do better.

I’m sorry, Takuma. I didn’t mean to hurt your
feelings.
All right...
Now come on, the school’s this way.
Right...
You’re not mad at me, are you?
No, I’m not mad.

It’s okay, you don’t have to hide it. You
really are mad at me, aren’t you?
I said I wasn’t mad!
See? I knew it.
(Unbelievable...)
